actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973, to authorize appropriations for 1987.
short_title: Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 1987

summary.text: Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 1987 - Amends the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to increase the authorization for the Board for International Broadcasting for FY 1987. Increases the amount of such authorization earmarked for radio modernization.

titles.title: Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 1987
A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973, to authorize appropriations for 1987.
